text: Dakota Lil is a 1950 American western movie. It is directed by Lesley Selander and stars George Montgomery, Rod Cameron, Marie Windsor, John Emery, Wallace Ford, Jack Lambert, and James Flavin. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Lesley Selander
title: Dakota Lil
